text:
Hi, Everyone – 
My team has been building <https://www.almanac.co/|a collaborative doc editor (info here — our goal is to take the best of Google Docs and MS Word, and improve on them both>). I’m trying to learn what features are most important for content marketers and would love feedback.

So far, we’ve heard: (1) export to WordPress and Markdown formatting, (2) better comments and built-in task management so action items don’t get lost among all the little changes, (3) the ability to create “variables” across all your content, so if you need to change one thing (a company name, a link), you do it once, not separately for every page.

I’m curious if these sound useful, or if there are other, bigger challenges you’ve had when writing/editing in Docs or Word? Thanks!

attachments.title: Almanac | The fastest doc editor ever built
attachments.text: Free yourself from bad collaboration. Spend time doing, not meeting. Work like the world's most productive people.
attachments.fallback: Almanac | The fastest doc editor ever built
